meanings.definition: A type of cloud that is thick and dark, bringing continuous rain or snow.
meanings.sent1: The nimbostratus cloud covered the sky, signaling an upcoming storm.
meanings.sent2: When nimbostratus clouds appear, it usually means it will rain soon.
meanings.sent3: The nimbostratus cloud looked like a giant rain blanket ready to pour down on the earth.
meanings.sent4: The nimbostratus cloud hung low like a heavy curtain of water waiting to fall.
meanings.sent5: The nimbostratus cloud loomed ominously, promising a day of relentless rain.

meanings.definition: The presence of nimbostratus clouds indicates that precipitation is likely.
meanings.sent1: We knew it would rain when the nimbostratus clouds gathered above us.
meanings.sent2: Nimbostratus clouds are a sure sign that we should carry an umbrella.
meanings.sent3: The nimbostratus clouds seemed to be playing a game of hide and seek with the rain.
meanings.sent4: The nimbostratus clouds were like a leaky faucet, ready to drip raindrops at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The nimbostratus clouds hovered menacingly, threatening to soak everything below.
